summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 脚本能够在设备上，事件呈现为对脚本函数的调用。On script-capable devices, the event is rendered as a call to a script function. 在其他设备上的事件呈现为 URL。On other devices, the event is rendered as a URL.

summary.span: 呈现与回发关联的标头。

span.span: Renders the header associated with postbacks.

summary.span: 对于支持脚本的浏览器，这包括执行回发的脚本块。

span.span: For browsers that support script, this includes a script block to perform postback.

summary.span: 将对回发事件的引用呈现为 URL。

span.span: Renders a reference to a postback event, as a URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回发呈现为 URL 未提交动态窗体数据，如文本框的内容，在回发。Postbacks rendered as a URL do not submit dynamic form data, such as text-box contents, on postback. 若要提交此类数据在回发时不支持脚本的设备上，使用对应的 HTML`submit`按钮。To submit such data on postback on devices that do not support script, use an HTML `submit` button instead.
